title: Fast Build Configuration
description: This file contains author name, min_sdk, dependencies, assets, and various build configurations. It also includes support for Kotlin, Java 8 features, and optimization settings.

author.title: Developer Name
author.description: This extension developer name will be included with the components_build_info.json.

auto_version.title: Auto-increment version
auto_version.description: If enabled, the version number of every component will be increased automatically during build process.

min_sdk.title: Extension's minimum Android SDK
min_sdk.description: The minimum version number of the Android SDK the extension needs in order to function properly. This MUST be greater than or equal to `7`.

kotlin.title: Kotlin Support
kotlin.description: If enabled, Kotlin Standard Libraries (V1.9.24) will be included with the extension. If you want to add specific Kotlin Standard Libraries so disable it.

desugar_sources.title: Desugaring Sources
desugar_sources.description: If enabled, you will be able to use Java 8 language features in your extension source classes, such as lambda expressions. When you use .kt classes, by default Fast will desugar sources.

desugar_deps.title: Desugaring dependencies
desugar_deps.description: Enable it, if any of your dependencies use Java 8 language features. If kotlin is enabled, by default Fast will desugar dependencies.

desugar_dex.title: Desugaring DEX
desugar_dex.description: If enabled, the D8 tool will generate desugared (classes.jar) classes.dex

deannonate.title: De-annotate
deannonate.description: If enabled, @annotations will not be present in the built extension.

filter_mit_classes.title: Filer MIT App Inventor Classes
filter_mit_classes.description: If enabled, matching classes provided by MIT will not be included in the built extension.

proguard.title: ProGuard
proguard.description: If enabled, it will optimizes the extension with ProGuard.

dependencies.title: Extension dependencies
dependencies.description: JAR dependencies of the extension. Only add the JARs that are needed during runtime here. Compile-time dependencies are not required to be added; they should only be present in the `deps` directory.

assets.title: Extension assets
assets.description: Should be present into assets directory.

mock_js.title: Mock JS for each Component.
mock_js.description: The file name should be like `ComponentName.mock.js`. It should be present into assets directory.

mock_css.title: Mock Css for each Component.
mock_css.description: The file name should be like `ComponentName.mock.css`. It should be present into assets directory.
